articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Singapore flags concern to India over ban on Sea's game
articles.description: Singapore has raised concerns with India about its ban of popular gaming app "Free Fire", owned by technology group Sea Ltd, in the first sign of diplomatic intervention after the move spooked investors, four sources told Reuters.
